attributes.action: Stop penalising pensioners when they have to pay £1 back for every £2 over the current allowance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should Pensioners have to pay back £1 for every £2 that they receive over the £22,900  personal allowance. This is tantamount to a 50% tax.20% is acceptable .why should we pay more tax than a millionaire ? The Government should have the strength of character to look after their Pensioners.Do it now please !
